greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of nondeficient proper divisors of n.
comment: Sum of divisors n smaller than n that are nondeficient numbers (in A023196).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
example: Proper divisors of 90 are 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 9, 10, 15, 18, 30, and 45. Of these 6, 18 and 30 are in A023196, thus a(90) = 6+18+30 = 54.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 14 2017
